name: james-damasco.github.io
description: The Cube is a web-based Rubic's cube puzzle game designed to test your skills in solving a cube in 3D. It uses **three.js** for 3D Rendering of the cube, and comes with a UI for timer, stats, theming, preferences, and scoring. The site shows you solve time, best and worst records, average of multiple solves, and other metrics while you play. ([https://knorcubesnininongryanmercado.netlify.app/]) Players can double tap to start the game, and enjoy smooth transitions, animations, and interactivity for an immersive experience.

scripts.build: rollup -c rollup.config.build.js && cp upup.min.js export/ && cp upup.sw.min.js export/ && cp index.html export/ && cp -R assets export/
